thread.title: Harley
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Harley

author: Harley
title: Harley
text: I came across this site through searching for Dr Martens on Google. I was reluctant to buy from this company only because I wasn't familiar with them and their prices were much cheaper than elsewhere. I saw this site offered free returns so I gave them a go and I am so glad I did! Boots came within the 48hour window as promised and are perfect. Alot of the other websites I browsed Dr Martens on were unclear about the size (couldn't tell what were for toddlers, children's etc) but this website was very clear, providing both the European size as well as UK. I was kept well up to date by email and delivery was traceable. Bargain item. Would recommend this company!
